#summary OpenWrt build instructions.

= Introduction =

The fowsr application can be built using the OpenWrt build system.


= Details =

The fowsr application is included as a package in OpenWrt. The easiest way to get a binary for a particular architecture may be to download the OpenWrt build system and to generate the binaries as described in this documentation:

http://kamikaze.openwrt.org/docs/openwrt.html
